profileAlternative.headline: Adjunct Professor of Computer Science at California State University, Fullerton

positions.title: Sr. Software Developer (C++/Python/JavaScript)
positions.description: Ported to Mac OS X and Visual Studio 2015 existing C++ and C, and customized Google's v8 C++/JS shell code. Ported to Mac OS X and Windows (using NodeJS) existing JS code using custom thread library and C++11/14's asynchronous libraries. node-gyp tool was used to generate dynamic library NodeJS add-ons for OS X and for Windows. Ported existing Python code to JavaScript and to C++.

positions.title: Independent Python/C++/Java developer
positions.description: Develop applications for Human Natural Language processing

Teaching professional programming teams cross-platform development skills in C++/11 and Python (3.5/2.7) throughout the United States at major telecommunication corporations in San Francisco, San Jose, Research Triangle Park (NC), Dallas, Atlanta, Cleveland, ...)
Python training emphasizes use of major Python frameworks (Django, SqlAlchemy, Flask, BeautifulSoup, PyQt)...

positions.title: C++ Instructor
positions.description: Teaching C++ and OODA/OOP through writing applications using C++14/C++11, the STL, Design Patterns, Algorithms, and Data structures -- using C++ class libraries including 3d/2d graphics and animations using the Qt libraries.

positions.title: Software Manager / Sr. SW developer

positions.title: Post-doctoral researcher
